message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $1800000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1400000. I can do $1700000, which is a significant concession from my initial offer. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I can do $1600000, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good return on my investment. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'll offer it to you for $1650000. Is that a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1550000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm not sure if we're getting too far apart, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $1580000, which is a bit higher than your last offer. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle this time. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1570000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $1570000, which is the same as your last offer. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but I'm not going to go any lower. Is that a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1570000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1560000. This is my final offer. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
